verses.verse: The YY <WH3068> shewed <WH7200> <WH8689> me, and, behold, two <WH8147> baskets <WH1736> of figs <WH8384> were set <WH3259> <WH8716> before <WH6440> the temple <WH1964> of the YY <WH3068>, after <WH310> that Nebuchadrezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> had carried away captive <WH1540> <WH8687> Y'khanyah-yahu <WH3204> the son <WH1121> of Y'hoyakim <WH3079> king <WH4428> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, and the princes <WH8269> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, with the carpenters <WH2796> and smiths <WH4525>, from Yerushalayim <WH3389>, and had brought <WH935> <WH8686> them to Babylon <WH894>.

One <WH259> basket <WH1731> had very <WH3966> good <WH2896> figs <WH8384>, even like the figs <WH8384> that are first ripe <WH1073>: and the other <WH259> basket <WH1731> had very <WH3966> naughty <WH7451> figs <WH8384>, which could not be eaten <WH398> <WH8735>, they were so bad <WH7455>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068> unto me, What seest <WH7200> <WH8802> thou, Yirmeyah-yahu <WH3414>? And I said <WH559> <WH8799>, Figs <WH8384>; the good <WH2896> figs <WH8384>, very <WH3966> good <WH2896>; and the evil <WH7451>, very <WH3966> evil <WH7451>, that cannot be eaten <WH398> <WH8735>, they are so evil <WH7455>.
Again the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; Like these good <WH2896> figs <WH8384>, so will I acknowledge <WH5234> <WH8686> them that are carried away captive <WH1546> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, whom I have sent <WH7971> <WH8765> out of this place <WH4725> into the land <WH776> of the Chaldeans <WH3778> for their good <WH2896>.

For I will set <WH7760> <WH8804> mine eyes <WH5869> upon them for good <WH2896>, and I will bring them again <WH7725> <WH8689> to this land <WH776>: and I will build <WH1129> <WH8804> them, and not pull them down <WH2040> <WH8799>; and I will plant <WH5193> <WH8804> them, and not pluck them up <WH5428> <WH8799>.

And I will give <WH5414> <WH8804> them an heart <WH3820> to know <WH3045> <WH8800> me, that I am the YY <WH3068>: and they shall be my people <WH5971>, and I will be their 'Elohim <WH430>: for they shall return <WH7725> <WH8799> unto me with their whole heart <WH3820>.

And as the evil <WH7451> figs <WH8384>, which cannot be eaten <WH398> <WH8735>, they are so evil <WH7455>; surely thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, So will I give <WH5414> <WH8799> TZidkiyah-yahu <WH6667> the king <WH4428> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, and his princes <WH8269>, and the residue <WH7611> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>, that remain <WH7604> <WH8737> in this land <WH776>, and them that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>:

And I will deliver <WH5414> <WH8804> them to be removed <WH2189> <WH8675> <WH2113> into all the kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth <WH776> for their hurt <WH7451>, to be a reproach <WH2781> and a proverb <WH4912>, a taunt <WH8148> and a curse <WH7045>, in all places <WH4725> whither I shall drive <WH5080> <WH8686> them.

And I will send <WH7971> <WH8765> the sword <WH2719>, the famine <WH7458>, and the pestilence <WH1698>, among them, till they be consumed <WH8552> <WH8800> from off the land <WH127> that I gave <WH5414> <WH8804> unto them and to their fathers <WH1>.
